abstract: DealBook asked readers what questions they would pose to Warren E. Buffett at Berkshire Hathaway’s annual meeting this weekend. Here is what some of you said.
snippet: DealBook asked readers what questions they would pose to Warren E. Buffett at Berkshire Hathaway’s annual meeting this weekend. Here is what some of you said.
lead_paragraph: For the Berkshire Hathaway annual shareholder meeting on April 30, DealBook asked readers what questions they would ask Warren E. Buffett. Many responded with queries related to the controversy over his former lieutenant, David L. Sokol, and and his trades in the shares of Lubrizol, a company Berkshire subsequently acquired. But some questions ranged much further than that.
